item.description:
Open Doors Manchester Arts and Cultural Tour
Thursday, October 21, 2010
5:00 p.m.-8:00 p.m.
FREE Admission

NEW! Try a Segway in the Elm Street Gallery of the Millyard Museum! Segway of Manchester will be demonstrating how to "glide" on one of these great transportation devices.

Hop on the trolley and visit art galleries and museums in the city including the Millyard Museum, SEE Science Center,Monte Verde Art Glass Studio, Art 3 Gallery, Langer Place, Manchester Artists Association Gallery, “Art on the Wall at City Hall” gallery, and Framers Market. The trolleys stop at all these locations approximately every 20-30 minutes throughout the evening.
item.name: Open Doors Manchester Arts and Cultural Tour
